Articles.Content: I was wondering what mods are recommened for 0.21. i do have mecheb installed
There are a ton, but here is my current set:

There currently exist an excessive quantity of threads identical to this, may of which made in the last few weeks, several of which were made in the last few days. This thread has no merit and I believe it should be closed

If you need suggestions seek out the previous threads, or better yet just go LOOK AT MODS and TRY THINGS.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46764-best-add-on-number

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46805-Probes-Probes-PROBES%21

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46618-The-search-for-a-specific-type-of-mod

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/43201-3m-Bi-Tri-Couplers

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44095-21-x-What-Mods-Add-ons-Should-I-Try

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46471-New-player-lookking-for-mods

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46265-Space-station-and-Base-parts

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46152-What-are-the-basic-mods-to-get

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45980-Looking-for-mods-that-work-with-21-1

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45982-Space-plane-mod-packs

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45768-Recommended-Add-On-packs-kits

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45817-Gemini-Capsule-Mod

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45381-Hollow-Space-station-parts

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41824-List-of-working-mods-working-not-working-for-0-21-1

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45438-Trying-to-locate-certain-mods-Please-assist%21-Thanks

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/40773-Hard-Mode-KSP-Mods

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44597-Where-can-i-get-nice-looking-heat-shields

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/43463-Good-Add-ons-that-aren-t-game-changing

These are the threads of people asking to be told about mods that they could have found themselves, and these are just the threads from the first four pages of this board, I could go further, or I could go to other boards. Threads such as these are worthless and spam.

Alternately you can go over to this board: forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/35-Add-on-Releases-and-Projects-Showcase

And click on any thread that strikes your fancy, if you want to be more deliberative about it, this message board system shows you how many people have posted in a thread, and how many times it's been viewed, there's also a five star rating scale, though it's not very useful given how few people contribute ratings. Most mods include in their title some means of designating what their parts do so you are by no means flying blind either way.
I think that is an appropriate conclusion to this thread.
